item.title: URL Shorteners as a Data Store
item.description: Because why not? GitHub repo In this blog post, Iâ€™m going to be talking about a proof of concept I created for a way to store data in any URL shortening service on the internet. I have been thinking of paradigms revolving around data. How data is stored, how itâ€™s transfered, and how itâ€™s consumed. I tried to do a couple of experiments in the storage aspect to see if I could come up with some new cool way of storing data.
